Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Andi Benton
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Scream hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
SYMBIOTE CODEX HUNTER: Plasticity, Shape Change. // When Scream KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead.
LASHING HAIR WHIP: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Precision Strike, Giant Reach: 3.
MOTHER OF MONSTERS: Support as FREE, but only to target characters with the Monster keyword.

excited to pull this piece in sealed, so many neat surprises on the dial (like leadership) but man my dice were off that day. I missed every roll (including leadership). She didn't do anything but absorb hit after hit. But I'll play her again, and things will be different!
